decision_conditions: The proposal as shown on drawings: BG01;P14 (Proposed Elevations and Sections); BG01;P07 (Existing Elevations and Sections); BG01;P03 (Existing Floor Plan); BG01;P02(Existing Floor Plan); BG01;P04 (Existing Floor Plan); BG01;P05 (Existing Floor Plan); BG01;P08 (Existing Sections); BG01;P06 (Existing Elevations); BG01;P09 (Proposed Floor Plan); BG01;P10(Proposed Floor Plan); BG01;P11 (Proposed Floor Plan); BG01;P12 (Proposed Floor Plan); BG01;P08 (Existing Sections); BG01;P06 (Existing Elevations); BG01;P13 (Proposed Elevations); BG01;P01 (Proposed Site Plan); Site Location Plan falls within the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015. It is therefore lawful.
description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end, rear roof extension, extending over outrigger; replace existing door with window and window opening with door on side elevation; replacement windows to front elevation; installation of two roof lights to front roof slope (Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed Development)
